channel.title: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: java heap space
channel.description:
Well, the title says the issue. I've narrowed it down to my newly added mod icons. I don't understand why it's giving me an heap error when I changed it's run parameters to 2+gbs of ram. here's the code for my mod_icons: [code] for(int l4 = 0; l4 < 9; l4++) modIcons[l4] = new Background(streamLoader_2, "mod_icons", l4);[/code] They're actually packed into the cache via toms cache suite.
Anyone got a solution?

item.title: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: java heap space
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, the title says the issue. I’ve narrowed it down to my newly added mod icons. I don’t understand why it’s giving me an heap error when I changed it’s run parameters to 2+gbs of ram.
here’s the code for my mod_icons:

for(int l4 = 0; l4 < 9; l4++) modIcons[l4] = new Background(streamLoader_2, "mod_icons", l4);
They’re actually packed into the cache via toms cache suite.

Anyone got a solution?
